message: I propose a fair deal - 99% for me, 1% for you.  Let's get this over with quickly!
I'll start with a fair offer, let's see if you can do better than this!
I'm willing to give you a larger share this time, but I still need the majority.  Let's avoid a stalemate!
I'll take a smaller share this time, but I'm not going to give you the majority!
Let's be reasonable. This is getting risky.  I'm offering you a significant amount, let's end this now.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll take a larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
This is my final offer.  I'm still willing to give you a large share, but we're running out of time.  Accept, and we both get something.  Reject, and we both get nothing.
You're running out of time, and I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll take the majority, but it's not like I'm being generous!
This is it.  I'm cutting my losses, but I'm still willing to give you a substantial amount.  We're getting dangerously close to the end.
You're getting desperate, and I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. I'll take the majority, and you'll get a small consolation prize.
We're down to the wire. I'm willing to split it evenly, but we're both going to get a lot less if we let this go to the final round.  It's a 50/50 chance of getting nothing!
